member.name: T:SymOntoClay.BaseBehavior
member.summary: Contains base recommended behavior.

member.name: M:SymOntoClay.BaseBehavior.AddStopFact
member.summary: Adds fact that the NPC has stopped itself. This method can be called both in main and in usual (not main) thread.

member.name: M:SymOntoClay.BaseBehavior.AddWalkingFact
member.summary: Adds fact that the NPC has started walking. This method can be called both in main and in usual (not main) thread.

member.name: M:SymOntoClay.BaseBehavior.AddRunningFact
member.summary: Adds fact that the NPC has started running. This method can be called both in main and in usual (not main) thread.

member.name: M:SymOntoClay.BaseBehavior.AddHoldFact(System.String)
member.summary: Adds fact that the NPC holds something in his hands. This method can be called both in main and in usual (not main) thread.

member.name: M:SymOntoClay.BaseBehavior.RemoveHoldFact
member.summary: Removes fact that the NPC holds something in his hands. This method can be called both in main and in usual (not main) thread.

member.name: M:SymOntoClay.BaseBehavior.StartRepeatingWalkingStepsSoundInMainThread
member.summary: Starts pushing sound facts that the NPS is walking. This method should be called only in main thread.

member.name: M:SymOntoClay.BaseBehavior.StartRepeatingWalkingStepsSoundInUsualThread
member.summary: Starts pushing sound facts that the NPS is walking. This method should be called only in usual (not main) thread.

member.name: M:SymOntoClay.BaseBehavior.StartRepeatingRunningStepsSoundInMainThread
member.summary: Starts pushing sound facts that the NPS is running. This method should be called only in main thread.

member.name: M:SymOntoClay.BaseBehavior.StartRepeatingRunningStepsSoundInUsualThread
member.summary: Starts pushing sound facts that the NPS is running. This method should be called only in usual (not main) thread.

member.name: M:SymOntoClay.BaseBehavior.StopRepeatingStepsSoundInMainThread
member.summary: Stops pushing sound facts that the NPS is walking or running. This method should be called only in main thread.

member.name: M:SymOntoClay.BaseBehavior.StopRepeatingStepsSoundInUsualThread
member.summary: Stops pushing sound facts that the NPS is walking or running. This method should be called only in usual (not main) thread.

member.summary: Starts pushing sound facts that something is shooting. This method should be called only in main thread.

member.summary: Starts pushing sound facts that something is shooting. This method should be called only in usual (not main) thread.

member.summary: Stops pushing sound facts that something is shooting. This method should be called only in main thread.

member.name: M:SymOntoClay.BaseBehavior.StopRepeatingShotSoundInUsualThread
member.summary: Stops pushing sound facts that something is shooting. This method should be called only in usual (not main) thread.

member.summary: Creates a rotation with the specified forward and upwards directions. It is a wrapper on Quaternion.LookRotation. This method should be called only in main thread.
